name: Noisy Neighbours
description:
Well, there you were, just trying to get your chores done for the day, and wouldn't you know it - you're a wizard, living among that scourge of modern life - neighbours. And wouldn't you know it, they're wizards too! Noisy wizard neighbours!

Get your chores done and keep the roof from falling on your head.

Left click to control, click a pillar or piece of furniture to repair it. Press and hold Q to cast the water spell.

Game made with LiamLime - https://liamlime.itch.io/
